name: Donation Link Manager
author: Hiroaki Miyashita

sections.description:
The Donation Link Manager plugin adds a donation link banner on your site especially for Japan Earthquake and Tsunami relief.

You can add any number of donation links amd banner designs. You can also use this plugin as the announcement tool which displays what you want to advertise.

Localization

  • Japanese (ja) – Hiroaki Miyashita

If you have translated into your language, please let me know.

Known Issues / Bugs

Uninstall

  1. Deactivate the plugin
  2. That’s it! ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Copy the donation-link-manager directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it! ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
• Donation banner does not appear in the site.

Please confirm whether do_action('wp_footer'); exists in footer.php of your theme.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Code cleanup.

1.0.1

  • Adds the default values of options in each language.

1.0

  • Initial release.
